languages.text: {n}Идира нервно ходит туда-сюда, то пытаясь заткнуть уши, то выкрикивая проклятья в адрес невидимых собеседников, то переходя на жалобный шепот и всхлипы. Словно живя своей жизнью, ее дрожащие пальцы то и дело ковыряют не успевшие зажить раны, оставшиеся от {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносского{/g} устройства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира нервно ходит туда-сюда, то пытаясь заткнуть уши, то выкрикивая проклятья в адрес невидимых собеседников, то переходя на жалобный шепот и всхлипы. Словно живя своей жизнью, ее дрожащие пальцы то и дело ковыряют не успевшие зажить раны, оставшиеся от {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносского{/g} устройства.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira paces back and forth, covering her ears, cursing at invisible interlocutors, and sometimes dissolving into pitiful whispers and sobs. Seemingly of their own volition, her trembling fingers pick at the unhealed wounds left by the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenodevice{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Идира нервно ходит туда-сюда, то пытаясь заткнуть уши, то выкрикивая проклятья в адрес невидимых собеседников, то переходя на жалобный шепот и всхлипы. Словно живя своей жизнью, ее дрожащие пальцы то и дело ковыряют не успевшие зажить раны, оставшиеся от {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносского{/g} устройства.{/n}

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira paces back and forth, covering her ears, cursing at invisible interlocutors, and sometimes dissolving into pitiful whispers and sobs. Seemingly of their own volition, her trembling fingers pick at the unhealed wounds left by the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenodevice{/g}.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉来回踱着步，捂着耳朵，咒骂着某个看不见的人，偶尔陷入可怜的低语与啜泣中。她颤抖的手指仿佛有着自己的意志，不断地抠着{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}装置留下的尚未愈合的伤口。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira paces back and forth, covering her ears, cursing at invisible interlocutors, and sometimes dissolving into pitiful whispers and sobs. Seemingly of their own volition, her trembling fingers pick at the unhealed wounds left by the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenodevice{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉来回踱着步，捂着耳朵，咒骂着某个看不见的人，偶尔陷入可怜的低语与啜泣中。她颤抖的手指仿佛有着自己的意志，不断地抠着{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}装置留下的尚未愈合的伤口。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira se mueve de un lado a otro, cubriéndose las orejas, insultando a interlocutores invisibles y, a veces, cayendo en susurros y sollozos lastimeros. Como por voluntad propia, sus dedos temblorosos hurgan en las heridas aún abiertas que le causó el dispositivo {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira paces back and forth, covering her ears, cursing at invisible interlocutors, and sometimes dissolving into pitiful whispers and sobs. Seemingly of their own volition, her trembling fingers pick at the unhealed wounds left by the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenodevice{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira se mueve de un lado a otro, cubriéndose las orejas, insultando a interlocutores invisibles y, a veces, cayendo en susurros y sollozos lastimeros. Como por voluntad propia, sus dedos temblorosos hurgan en las heridas aún abiertas que le causó el dispositivo {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは耳をふさぎ、見えない相手に罵声を浴びせ、時には情けないささやき声と嗚咽を漏らしながら行ったり来たりしている。まるで己の意志があるかのごとく、彼女の震える指は、{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ゼノデバイス{/g}が残した癒えぬ傷を摘んでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira paces back and forth, covering her ears, cursing at invisible interlocutors, and sometimes dissolving into pitiful whispers and sobs. Seemingly of their own volition, her trembling fingers pick at the unhealed wounds left by the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenodevice{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは耳をふさぎ、見えない相手に罵声を浴びせ、時には情けないささやき声と嗚咽を漏らしながら行ったり来たりしている。まるで己の意志があるかのごとく、彼女の震える指は、{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ゼノデバイス{/g}が残した癒えぬ傷を摘んでいる。{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira schreitet auf und ab, hält sich die Ohren zu, verflucht unsichtbare Sprecher und beginnt manchmal völlig aufgelöst zu wimmern und zu schluchzen. Wie von allein zupfen ihre zitternden Finger an den unverheilten Wunden, die das {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Gerät hinterlassen hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira paces back and forth, covering her ears, cursing at invisible interlocutors, and sometimes dissolving into pitiful whispers and sobs. Seemingly of their own volition, her trembling fingers pick at the unhealed wounds left by the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenodevice{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira schreitet auf und ab, hält sich die Ohren zu, verflucht unsichtbare Sprecher und beginnt manchmal völlig aufgelöst zu wimmern und zu schluchzen. Wie von allein zupfen ihre zitternden Finger an den unverheilten Wunden, die das {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Gerät hinterlassen hat.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira fait les cent pas. Les mains sur les oreilles, elle peste contre des interlocuteurs invisibles et il lui arrive de sangloter ou de murmurer d'un air piteux. De manière presque compulsive, ses doigts tremblants viennent gratter les plaies encore ouvertes infligées par l'appareil {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira paces back and forth, covering her ears, cursing at invisible interlocutors, and sometimes dissolving into pitiful whispers and sobs. Seemingly of their own volition, her trembling fingers pick at the unhealed wounds left by the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenodevice{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira fait les cent pas. Les mains sur les oreilles, elle peste contre des interlocuteurs invisibles et il lui arrive de sangloter ou de murmurer d'un air piteux. De manière presque compulsive, ses doigts tremblants viennent gratter les plaies encore ouvertes infligées par l'appareil {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira; bir geri bir ileri yürüyor, kulaklarını kapatıyor, görünmez birilerine küfürler yağdırıyor ve kimi zaman da yürek parçalayan fısıltı ve hıçkırıklara teslim oluyor. Titreyen parmaklarıyla; anladığın kadarıyla gayet de bile isteye, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno cihazının{/g} açtığı henüz iyileşmemiş yaraları kaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Idira paces back and forth, covering her ears, cursing at invisible interlocutors, and sometimes dissolving into pitiful whispers and sobs. Seemingly of their own volition, her trembling fingers pick at the unhealed wounds left by the {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenodevice{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, bir geri bir ileri yürüyor, kulaklarını kapatıyor, görünmez birilerine küfürler yağdırıyor ve kimi zaman da yürek parçalayan fısıltı ve hıçkırıklara teslim oluyor. Titreyen parmaklarıyla, anladığın kadarıyla gayet de bile isteye, {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno cihazı{/g}nın açtığı henüz iyileşmemiş yaraları kaşıyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
